scripts.start: source ~/emsdk/emsdk_env.sh && em++ main.cpp -std=c++11 -s EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS='['_main', '_move', '_jump', '_get_player_x', '_get_player_y', '_get_cherry_x', '_get_cherry_y', '_get_speed_x' ,'_get_speed_y', '_get_score']' -s EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='['ccall', 'cwrap']' -o hello.js && python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8080
